Name: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Repealing the padlock law.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the padlock law
Summary: This bill repeals the Padlock Law, which permits the NYPD to close a residence or business housing illicit activities after two offenses and one conviction, without judicial review.
Text:
Int. No. 1326
 
By Council Members Levin, Torres, Williams, The Speaker (Council Member Mark-Viverito), Gibson, Palma, Chin and Menchaca

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the padlock law
..Body
 
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Sections 10-155 and 10-156 of the administrative code of the city of New York are REPEALED.
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately.
